font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 贬低，贬损： to reduce to a lower standing in one's own eyes or in others' eyes
【例】 You must not debase yourself by such behavior.
【近】 abase, debauch, degrade, demean, demoralize, deprave, deteriorate, profane, subvert, vitiate
【反】 aggrandize, canonize, deify, elevate, exalt, ennoble 使神圣
【记】 base 底部，基础
【另】 abase 降低
